GSP28prakp04u:15: tathā ajātāvapi jātivyavahāro bahulamupalabhyate keṣāñciditi tannirākaraṇāyedamārabhyate /
GSP28prakp04u:18: pūrvapakṣaḥ- nanvāśraya eva dravyaṃ jāterasaditi saugatāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:19: tathāhi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyeṣu jātirāśritābhimatā,
GSP28prakp04u:23: na kasyacijjantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇapathavidūravartiṣu nipuṇamapi nirūpayo 'nuvṛttākārāvabhāsino matirāvirbhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:27: na ca sthaleṣu dravyeṣa jātiḥ samaveyāt,
GSP28prakp04u:31: tatra tāvad dravyārambha eva na sādhīyāniti manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:41: anenaiva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimirdvyaṇukairārambhaṇīyasya mahimaguṇaśālinaḥ sambhavo nirastaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:43: api cāvayavinaḥ kimavayaveṣu pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ ?
GSP28prakp04u:48: ekaikāvayavagate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasyāvayavinaḥ kamparāgapratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp04u:51: rajyeta na rajyeta ceti viṣamāṃ daśāmāviśet /
GSP28prakp04u:60: na ca prakārāntareṇa vṛttiriti vadituṃ śakyam;
GSP28prakp04u:62: avayavebhyaścāvayavī vyatiricyamāno 'vyatiricyamāno vā na pramāṇena saṅgacchate /
GSP28prakp04u:73: dūrādiva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanamiti matiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:80: aśaktasvabhāvaṃ tu nityatvādavicikitsayāśaktikaṃ nityaṃ na kiñcit kuryāt /
GSP28prakp04u:84: kiñca samunmiṣitacakṣuṣaścirāya viṣayāntarānusandhānavyāvṛttacittasya purovartinīṃ svastimatīṃ kālākṣīṃ vā sākṣātkurvāṇasyeva na jātiraparāvabhāsate
GSP28prakp04u:91: seyaṃ nityā jātiruditavatyāṃ vyaktau pratīyamānā nānyata āgatā,
GSP28prakp04u:106: tathābhāve vyaktyā sahotpāde vināśe vā svarūpahāniprasaṅga iti purastādupanyastam /
GSP28prakp04u:107: vyaktimātrāṅgīkāre ca ko 'smatpakṣasya asya ca bheda ityapi cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:108: ato vyaktimātramevava tattvamiti vadatāṃ sāhāyyakamevācaritamanatirekiṇīṃ jātimurarīkurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:113: kaḥ khalu iha gavi gotvamiti matimabhyupagacchet,
GSP28prakp04u:115: bhinnatve ca vṛttiprakāro durnirūpa eva---kiṃ vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ ?
GSP28prakp04u:117: ekatra ca parisamāptāvanyatra na varteteti punarapi svarūpahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:119: pratyekañca gauḥ gauriti pratyayo vikalpamātramityaṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:121: na copalambhabalena virodha eva nāstīti caturasram,
GSP28prakp04u:125: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇākārapratītisamaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇenākāreṇāvabhātastadābhedapratītidaśāyāmeka ākāro 'nubhavanīyaḥ---sa jātibhāgasya
GSP28prakp04u:135: vayantu vivakṣāmātraparatāntrāḥ śabdā na vastuvyavasthāpanāyeśata iti sarvatra manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:136: kathaṃ tarhi gaurgauriti nānābhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiranuvṛttamākāramullikhantī samupajāyate ?
GSP28prakp04u:138: asti tadviśeṣaṇaṃ yaduparāgavaśeneyaṃ bhinneṣvabhinnākārānusandhāyinī dhīrudīyata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:140: kāryabhūtā hi buddhireṣā kāraṇamākṣipantī yadanantaramevopajāyate tadeva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati,
GSP28prakp04u:142: sā ceyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanasamanantarabhāvinīti tā eva vyaktayaḥ svanirbhāsā buddhīrupajanayya tanmukhena tāmekākārānubhāsinīṃ dhiyamāvirbhāvayanti
GSP28prakp04u:143: nitāntabhedavatīnāṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ kāsāṃcideṣa mahimā na sarvāsāmiti kimanupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:144: yathā hyatyantabhinnā api cakṣurālokamanassaṃyogāḥ ekasāmagrīsamupanipatitā ekavijñānodayalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamārabhante,
GSP28prakp04u:145: tathā vyaktayo 'pi kiṃ nārabhanta iti nedaṃ pratipattikaṭhinam /
GSP28prakp04u:146: sā ceyaṃ svākāreṇābhedenātyantikabhedayoginīnāmapi vyaktīnāṃ bhedaṃ samvṛṇotīti saṃvṛtirityanugīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:147: eṣā ca manīṣā na svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayīkaroti,
GSP28prakp04u:161: tadevaṃ viśadāviśadatayā niyatāniyatatayā ca svalakṣaṇasya vikalpākārasya ca bhede
GSP28prakp04u:162: satyapi vikalpāḥ sākṣātparamparayā vā svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanaprabhavatayā svalakṣaṇagrahaṇābhimānino jāyante /
GSP28prakp04u:163: tata eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣaṃ vyavahārāṅgabhāvamanubhavanti /
GSP28prakp04u:166: yathā hi khalu maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇidīptāyāṃ maṇikiraṇaviṣayiṇī maṇibuddhirayathārthatayā bhedamajuṣamāṇāpi maṇimanu pratibaddheti maṇisamadhigamanimittaṃ
GSP28prakp04u:168: darśanato vikalpa iti svalakṣaṇapratibaddhā satī tatprāptaye prabhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:171: anyathā vastuviṣayatayā vastuprāpakatayā cānumānamiva pramāṇameva syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:172: sa cāyaṃ tasyākāraḥ prathamāno na jñānasyaiva,
GSP28prakp04u:189: siddhāntaḥ--- atrocyate---saṃvideva hi bhagavatī viṣayasattvopagame śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:190: gavādiṣu ca sthūlākārāvalambinī saṃvidudīyata iti nirvivādam /
GSP28prakp04u:191: nayavīthyāñca nirṇītaṃ pramāṇaṃ smṛtiśca naḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:200: tenāvayavā eva samāsāditasaṃyogalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaguṇā avayavina utpādakā bhaviśyanti /
GSP28prakp04u:203: ekātiriktānekābhāve 'pyekaiva eva sadvitīya āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:204: nanu dravyaṃ eva tathotpanne saṃyogavikalpamāvirbhāvayato na tadatirekī saṃyogo nāma kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:206: kādācitkī ca tayorapareyaṃ daśā dṛśyata iti bhavatyeva bhedasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:213: avayavāntarairapi ca vinā sa tasya ko 'pi mahimā,
GSP28prakp04u:214: ya eka evānekāvayavānusyūta iti kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28prakp04u:216: saṃyogasacivā evāvayavā janakā āśrayabhūtā yataḥ janakatayaivāśrayatvāt samavāyikāraṇānām /
GSP28prakp04u:217: ata eva saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyāśraya iti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:222: kāryasiddhyarthaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ parikalpyate na kāryavināśāya /
GSP28prakp04u:227: pratyekaṃ tu teṣāṃ śakyata evāsahopalambho 'pi vaktum,
GSP28prakp04u:231: avayavī hi sthavīyāneko hṛdayamāgacchati avayavāstu kṣodīyāṃso bhūyāṃsaśca /
GSP28prakp04u:232: sa cāyamavayavī mahattvādrūpavattvācca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśano vā,
GSP28prakp04u:238: gaganādīnāṃ tu mahatāmapi rūpasparśavidhuratayā na pratyakṣagocaratetyalamativistareṇa /
GSP28prakp04u:249: api ca darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇādrūpasparśavyatireki dravyaṃ sphuṭatarapratītaṃ tat nāpanhotumucitam /
GSP28prakp04u:250: ata eva vanādiṣu bādhakapratyayabalena tatkalpanā na prasaratīti dūratayāntarālāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāraḥ pravartata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:253: yaccedamuditaṃ 'nityatayā jāterātmavijñānajanane 'pi na śaktateti' tadapi 68kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇaparvaṇi vistareṇa nityānāmathakriyākāritvasamarthanena pratyuktam /
GSP28prakp04u:257: athavā na khalviyamājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇabhūtasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:258: yastu yataḥ pratītaye sa tasya viṣaya iti sarvālaukikam /
GSP28prakp04u:260: asaṃvivādaśca tasmādātmalābhāt anyatastu bhavato69'tathābhūtasya vābhāve 'pi bhāvasambhavānniyamena saṃvādāyogāditi bālādabhyupeyaṃ pratyakṣasya kāraṇameva viṣaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:261: ata eva ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe;
GSP28prakp04u:269: arthāvisamvādi ca pramāṇaṃ vyavajihīrṣamāṇā laukikā ādriyante iti /
GSP28prakp04u:272: tenaiva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite nāsti pratyayāntaranibandhanāvisaṃvādaprārthanā /
GSP28prakp04u:277: etadarthameva nayavīthyāṃ“sarvaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayāvyabhicāri” iti pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp04u:278: ato nityāyāmapi jātau bhavatyeva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28prakp04u:279: yat punaruktam---'ekabhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kālākṣīṃ svastimatīṃ vā nāsti jātipratītiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:284: agrahaṇe 'pi ca dharmasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ nānupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:285: ata eva ca piṇḍāntarasamadhigame pūrvākāraparāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñāsamākhyātodīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:286: yaccoktam 'anāśrayatayā tatraiva prāganavasthitā niṣkriyatayā cānyasmādanāgacchantī svarūpahāniprasaṅgena vyaktyā sahānupajāyamānā kathaṃ sambandhamanubhavati jātiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:290: saṃyogajo vā yathā tantuturīsaṃyogādutpannasya paṭasya turīsaṃyogaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:310: ko hi nāma sacetanaḥ padārthāntarapratyabhijñāmabhedāśrayeṇa sādhayet /
GSP28prakp04u:311: ko vā parasparavirodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte /
GSP28prakp04u:324: vyaktyantare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācyapiṇḍaparihāreṇa prakāśate /
GSP28prakp04u:325: udīcyapiṇḍaparihārastu prāktanapiṇḍasamadhigamasamaye siddha eveti parihṛtanikhilānupapatitakamupapāditaṃ gavādiṣu sādhāraṇākārānubhavasiddhaṃ jātitattvam /
GSP28prakp04u:329: gaurayamiti ca matirviśadatarārthanirbhāsinī prathata iti cet /
GSP28prakp04u:332: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratarāvayavarūpāvabhāsādviśadāvagama iti nābāhyaviṣayatvāpattiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:333: nanveṣā jātipratītirbhinnāmeva vyaktimabhedenāvagamayantī jāyata iti bhrāntireṣā na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:334: iyantu bhrāntirnirbījā na yujyata iti bījabhāvena jātiranumīyate,
GSP28prakp04u:341: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayoga eva śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:342: prayogaśca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā nānupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:349: bhavati hi sarveṣveva satsaditi pratyayānuvṛttiriti saṃvadantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:366: tatra pramāṇasambandhasya vartamānatvāt sarvatra vartamānasattāpratayayena bhavitavyam /
GSP28prakp04u:367: tadatirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānādyuktastridhāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:368: api ca bhūmitalanikhāteṣu ciratarakālavartiṣu pralīnajñātṛpuruṣeṣuliṅgādirahiteṣu sakalapramāṇapratyastamaye 'pi vartamānasattāsandehaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:374: yogyatā tu pramāṇasambandhātiriktā pramāṇenāvasīyata iti yukta evāstīti pramāṇodayaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:382: anyathā śaśaśṛṅgādīnāmanutpannātivṛttānāñca kimiti mahāsāmānyena sambandha eva na syāditi paryanuyoge,
GSP28prakp04u:391: atha nityāyā api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandho yaḥ sa trikālaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:394: tasmātsvarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabdo na punareka ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravyaguṇakarmaṇām /
GSP28prakp04u:395: 77api ca kāśyapīyānāṃ jātisamavāyaviśeṣeṣu svarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabda ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:397: tadevamapākṛte padārthasvarūpātirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattākhye yat svamanīṣānirmitakutarkabalena sanmātraviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti sādhitaṃ,
GSP28prakp04u:402: so 'pi śrotragrahaṇopādhilabdhapravṛttiriti na jātu jātikalpanāyai vibhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:404: yadāhuḥ 78“śabdatvameva tattadasādhāraṇābhivyañjakadhvaninibandhanatayā nānāvarṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasyārthasyāvagamāya kalpata” iti /
GSP28prakp04u:413: yaccopadarśitam---yathā vilīnamājyaṃ tailādavyatiricyamānaṃ gandhagrahaṇasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣaiva bhinnamavagamtaya---iti /
GSP28prakp04u:423: anādau saṃsāre janyajanakabhāvena vyavasthitāstāvat kāścideva strīpuruṣasantatayaḥ santi,
GSP28prakp04u:425: anidamprathamatayā ca santateḥ sarveṣāṃ tatsantatipatitatvāt siddhā brāhmaṇaśabdavācyatā /
GSP28prakp04u:431: tathā ca tajjanyatve 'vagate brāhmaṇaśabdaṃ prayuñjate lokāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:434: saṃbhavanti hi puṃścalyo striyaḥ pariṇetāraṃ vyabhicarantyaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:438: tāvatyāṃ satyāmapi yāsāṃ vyabhicāro na dṛśyate,
GSP28prakp04u:440: api ca apramattaiḥ striyo rakṣaṇīyāstāsu nāstyeva vyabhicārasambhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:443: na caitāvatā yatrāpi niścayaḥ śakyastatrāpyaniścaya iti vaktuṃ yuktamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:444: yacca bahvīṣu jvālāsvekavartivartinīṣu jvālātvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñāgocaraḥ kaiścidipyate /
GSP28prakp04u:446: sa khalvevaṃ nirīkṣañcakre ananyathāsiddhā buddhiḥ sāmānyakalpanābījam /
GSP28prakp04u:447: iyaṃ tu bhedāgrahaṇena śuktikārajatapratyayavadupapadyata iti nālaṃ sāmānyamaupasthāpayitum /
GSP28prakp04u:448: tena bhedagrahaṇapurassaramabhedajñānaṃ bhinneṣu jātyabhyupagame śaraṇamiti niravadyam /
GSP28prakp04u:451: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāyaśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ jātinirṇayo nāma caturthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
